entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023
